popover.primary: A mastery path focused on long range attacks with your gun
A mastery path focused on short-range combat with grenades and bombs
A mastery path focused on close combat using your deployables and gadgets

data.name: Acid Bomb
data.description: You toss a grenade which splatters a corrosive acid everywhere. Your target and all other enemies within 20 feet of them have Corporeal resistance reduced by 236 and suffer 427 Corporeal damage over 21 seconds.

data.name: Addling Shot
data.description: You Detaunt your target, making them hate you less and causing them to deal 50% damage to you for 15 seconds. If you attack anyone that you have Detaunted, the effect will immediately end.

data.name: Ancestral Inheritance
data.description: Increases your Armor by 660.

data.name: Armored Plating
data.description: Everyone in your group within 100 feet takes only 80% damage for 20 seconds.

data.name: Artillery Barrage
data.description: You select a spot on the ground and call in an artillery strike for up to 4 seconds, dealing 600 damage per second to all enemies within 30 feet of that spot.

data.name: Autoloader
data.description: You regain action points 30% faster for 10 seconds.

data.name: Bandolier
data.description: All of your Path of the Grenadier abilities cost 35% fewer action points.

data.name: Barbed Wire
data.description: You fling coils of barbed wire all around you, rooting all enemies within 30 feet in place for 5 seconds. There is a 50% chance of the root breaking with every hit.

data.name: Blunderbuss Blast
data.description: You fire a blast of short-range pellets which deal X damage to all enemies in front of you, up to 40 feet away.

data.name: Bolster War Engine
data.note: Not usable on Siege Rams or Oil
data.description: Siege Targetted buff. Increases damage done by that siege engine by 2% for 10 seconds.

data.name: Bombardment Turret
data.description:
You construct a turret with an auto-firing grenade launcher which will attack enemies at a moderate range. The turret gains 100% of your Ballistic Skill, 30% of your Weapon Skill, and 70% of your Wounds from item bonuses. While you are within 25 feet of the turret you will scavenge extra parts from the turret to create improvised upgrades for your weapons, increasing your damage by 4% every 2 seconds to a maximum of 20%.
You will lose 4 stacks of this effect every time a turret is destroyed for any reason.

data.name: Bugman's Best
data.description: You carefully unpack a mini-keg of rare and precious Bugman's Finest Stout with reverential awe. For the next 15 seconds, the faint vapors escaping from the keg will rejuvenate any group members within 30 feet of it, restoring 224 health every 3 seconds. You dream of the day that the brew will be aged enough to actually tap and drink.

data.name: Burn Salve
data.description: You distribute burn salve to groupmember's within 100 feet, increasing everyone's Elemental resistance by 252 for 60 minutes.

data.name: Cannon Smash
data.description: A massive cannonball smashes into your target, dealing 2400 damage and reducing their armor by 1400 for 30 seconds.

data.name: Clever Recovery
data.description:
If an enemy dodges any of your attacks, you will regain 75 Action Points.
This effect will not trigger more than once every 3 seconds.

data.name: Concealment
data.description: With luck and experience you are able to Dodge all ranged attacks and Disrupt all magic attacks against you for 7 seconds.

data.name: Concussion Grenade
data.description: You lob a grenade that releases a powerful shockwave on impact, dealing 291 Corporeal damage to your target and knocking them back a short distance. Monsters will be knocked down instead.

data.name: Concussive Mine
data.description: When your Land Mine detonates, any enemy hit by the blast will become disoriented for 10 seconds, increasing the build times of their abilities by 50%.

data.name: Coordinated Fire
data.description: Signal Flare will now also cause the victim to suffer 15% more damage from all sources.

data.name: Crack Shot
data.description: A well-aimed shot which deals 293 damage and disarms your target for 3 seconds, making them unable to use their weapons.

data.name: Diminish War Engine
data.note: Not usable on Siege Rams or Oil
data.description: Siege Targetted debuff. Decreases damage done by that siege engine to 98% for 10 seconds.

data.name: Electromagnet
data.description:
You set up a device which unleashes a powerful wave of force, pulling up to six enemy players within 75 feet inwards towards it and knocking down monsters. 1 second later, the device blasts outwards and snares all enemies within 30 feet, reducing their movement speed by 40% for 4 seconds.
The attack uses the Ranged statistic.

data.name: Expert Skirmisher
data.description: Your cast times are reduced to 50% when you are within 20 feet of your target.

data.name: Explosive Shots
data.description:
All of your ranged attacks will explode for the next 10 seconds, dealing 300 damage to all enemies within 20 feet of your target.
This effect will not trigger more than once every second.

data.name: Extra Ammo
data.description: When you construct a turret, it will restore 20 Action Points to everyone within 30 feet every 2 seconds.

data.name: Extra Powder
data.description: Acid Bomb and Fragmentation Grenade gain a 50% increase to the size of their areas of effect.

data.name: Fightin' Chance
data.description: Increases your Strength, Ballistic Skill, and Weapon Skill by 120, but reduces your Toughness by 120.

data.name: Firebomb
data.description: You toss a grenade filled with flaming pitch which deals 266 Corporeal damage to your target.

data.name: Flak Jacket
data.description: You don an experimental suit of protective gear, increasing your Armor by 560 for up to 1 hours.

data.name: Flame Turret
data.description:
You construct a turret with a self-firing flamethrower which will attack enemies at close range. The turret gains 100% of your Ballistic Skill, 10% of your Weapon Skill, and 90% of your Wounds from item bonuses. While you are within 25feet of the turret you will scavenge extra parts from the turret to create improvised upgrades for your weapons, increasing your damage by 4% every 2 seconds to a maximum of 20%.
You will lose 4 stacks of this effect every time a turret is destroyed for any reason.

data.name: Flashbang Grenade
data.description: You toss a grenade which explodes with a burst of force, dealing 291 Corporeal damage to the target. The blinding flash interrupts the victim and all enemies within 20 feet of them.

data.name: Flee
data.description:
You run away from the battle in a mad panic, increasing your run speed by 30 for 10 seconds. You immediately lose all of your action points, any career mechanic points, and your Morale will begin to drop, and you will not begin to regain action points until 10 seconds have passed.

You can use this ability again to cancel the effect early, but you will still remain panicked and will not regain action points for the full duration.

data.name: Fling Explosives
data.description: You fling packets of explosives all around you for up to 4 seconds, dealing 600 damage each second to all enemies within 30 feet.

data.name: Focused Fire
data.description: You focus all of your shots on your enemy for up to 3 seconds, dealing 219 damage to them every second. This effect will end if you lose your concentration or run out of action points.

data.name: Focused Mind
data.description: For the next 10 seconds, you will remove and ignore any rooting, snaring, disarming, silencing or disabling effects. Your cast times are reduced by 50%, and you cannot be set back.

data.name: Friction Burn
data.description:
A powerful swipe with your spanner which smacks all enemies in front of you up to 40 feet away, dealing 501 Corporeal damage over 9 seconds.
The attack uses the Ranged statistic.

data.name: Gun Blast
data.description: A gun attack which deals 387 damage to your enemy.

data.name: Gun Turret
data.description:
You construct a turret with a self-aiming gun which will fire at distant enemies. The turret gains 75% of your Ballistic Skill and Weapon Skill from item bonuses and 50% of your Wounds from item bonuses. While you are within 25 of the turret you will scavenge extra parts from the turret to create improvised upgrades for your weapons, increasing your damage by 4% every 2 seconds to a maximum of 20%.

You will lose 4 stacks of this effect every time a turret is destroyed for any reason.

data.name: Hail of Doom
data.description: You focus on a spot on the ground, shooting arrows at that spot every 0.5 seconds for 5 seconds, hitting all enemies within 20 feet of that area for 300 damage as long as you maintain your concentration.

data.name: Hamper War Engine
data.note: Not usable on Siege Rams or Oil
data.description: Siege Targetted debuff. Increases the cooldown times of that siege engine by 50% for 10 seconds

data.name: Hand-Crafted Scope
data.description: Increases your autoattack speed by 50% when using a gun.

data.name: Hip Shot
data.description: A quick shot from the hip which deals 216 damage. This attack may be used at close range.

data.name: Hollow-Points
data.description: Snipe and Gun Blast will now deal an additional 505 damage over 5 seconds.

data.name: Incendiary Rounds
data.description: You fire bullets that burst into flame when they strike the enemy, dealing 860 Corporeal damage over 15 seconds.

data.name: Land Mine
data.description: You fling out a land mine which arms itself immediately and persists for up to 1 minute. The mine will detonate when an enemy gets too close, dealing 243 damage to all enemies within 30 feet and staggering them for up to 5 seconds, preventing all actions unless they are damaged.

data.name: Lightning Rod
data.description: You deploy a shock rod at your feet which will remain for up to 9 seconds and periodically blast out with waves of power, dealing 229 Corporeal damage every 3 seconds to all enemies within 30 feet of it.

data.name: Masterful Aim
data.description: Increases your Ballistic Skill by 160

data.name: Napalm Grenade
data.description:
You toss a grenade packed full of dangerous napalm gel on to the ground, where it will burst open and burn for 30 seconds, causing damaging every 2 seconds to any enemies who come within 20 feet of that spot. The fires increase in intensity over time, causing 79 Corporeal damage during the first 10 seconds, 146 Corporeal damage for the next 10 seconds, and 212 Corporeal damage for the final 10 seconds.
If there are multiple Napalm Grenades in the same area only the highest level one will deal damage.

data.name: Phosphorous Shells
data.description: A barrage of mortar attacks which continously fire at a spot on the ground that you select for up to 6 seconds, dealing 243 Corporeal damage every 2 secpnds to all enemies within 20 feet of that spot, and snares them by 20%. This requires careful aim, and if hit you'll lose .5 seconds from the channel.

data.name: Pierce Defenses
data.description: If an enemy blocks, dodges, or parries any of your attacks, their chances to block, dodge, and parry will be reduced by 15% for 10 seconds.

data.name: Point-Blank
data.description: A mid-range attack that deals 600 damage and knocks the targeted player away. Monsters will be knocked down.

data.name: Proximity Alarm
data.description: Increases the chance for you and your groupmates to detect hidden enemies by 50% while you or your group are within 20 feet feet of your turret.

data.name: Quick Reloader
data.description: All of your Path of the Rifleman abilities cost 35% fewer action points.

data.name: Redeploy
data.description: You activate your Turret's automatic redeployment mechanism, instantly moving it to your current location.

data.name: Reinforced Casing
data.description: Adds 160 Wounds to your turrets.

data.name: Scattershot
data.description: You release a string of several gun blasts in a row for up to 4 seconds, dealing 600 damage each second to all enemies in front of you, up to 40 feet away.

data.name: Self-Destruct
data.description: You activate the self-destruct mechanism built into your turret, destroying the turret and dealing 370 Corporeal damage to all enemies within 30 feet of it, knocking them down for 2 seconds.

data.name: Shock Grenade
data.description: You toss a grenade at an ally which removes stagger effects from them and five others within 25 feet.

data.name: Signal Flare
data.description: You mark the enemy with a bright signal flare, dealing 1225 damage over 21 seconds and reducing their chances to dodge or block attacks by 5%.

data.name: Snipe
data.description: A slow but powerful gun shot which deals 538 damage to your enemy and can not be defended against.

data.name: Spanner Swipe
data.description:
You clobber your enemy with your spanner, dealing 253 damage and reducing their run speed by 40% for 10 seconds.
The attack uses the Ranged statistic.

data.name: Static Discharge
data.description: You quickly trigger one of your many gadgets and release a sudden shockwave, dealing 158 Corporeal damage to all enemies within 30 feet.

data.name: Sticky Bomb
data.description: A packet of explosives which sticks to your target and slowly burns, dealing 432 Corporeal damage over 15 seconds. If the effect runs for its full course or the target is killed, then a concealed inner package of explosives will suddenly detonate, dealing 183 Corporeal damage to the victim and all enemies within 20 feet of them.

data.name: Stopping Power
data.description: Hip Shot now will knock the victim back a short distance.

data.name: Stoutness of Stone
data.description: You recover from Stuns and Knockdowns 50% quicker. You will still gain immunity based on the original duration.

data.name: Strafing Run
data.description: You call for air support, signaling for a strafing run which deals 403 damage to all enemies in a line in front of you, up to 65 feet away. Any enemy players hit by the powerful shells will be sent flying away from you, while monsters will be knocked down.

data.name: Stubbornness
data.description: Increases your Corporeal resistance by 252.

data.name: Tangling Wire
data.description: After ending or being removed, Barbed Wire will now Snare targets by 40% and deal 246 damage over 5 seconds.

data.name: Throwing Arm
data.description: Increases the ranges of all Path of the Grenadier abilities by 25%.

data.name: Tracer Rounds
data.description: Increases your chance to critically hit by 15% as long as you are within 100 feet of your turret.

data.name: Trench Fighting
data.description: Your damage is increased by 15% when under 45 feet away from your target.

data.name: Well-Oiled Machine
data.description: You can now construct your turrets instantly and the cost of Redeploy is reduced to 0 Action Points.

data.name: Armor-piercing Rounds
data.description: You load your rifle with the finest of rounds. Your attacks will ignore 25% of the victim's armor for 12seconds.

data.name: Mortar Round
data.description: You fire a mortar at your target, dealing 300 damage to them and everyone within 20 feet every second for 4 seconds.
